thread.title: Ariana Grande Called Herself ‘The Hardest Working 23 Year Old’ And People Went HAM Destroying Her For It
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande Called Herself ‘The Hardest Working 23 Year Old’ And People Went HAM Destroying Her For It

author: Douglas Charles
title: Ariana Grande Called Herself ‘The Hardest Working 23 Year Old’ And People Went HAM Destroying Her For It
text:
Getty Image

Oh my. Talk about being out of touch with the rest of the world. Ariana Grande just hit the motherlode of cluelessness.
The woman who (allegedly, but I 100% believe it) has her handlers carry her around because she’s too lazy to walk and comes from a wealthy family actually claimed on Instagram that she is “the hardest working 23-year-old human being on earth.” 
Actually, let me back up, it was really even worse than that. Here’s the exact quote, “When you’re cute but you’re also the hardest working 23 year old human being on earth #cute #butalso #CEO #unfuckwitable #haventsleptinyears.”
So she not only insulted thousands of other 23-year-olds (and those who know them) she also very humbly called HERSELF “cute.” Nice.

Some responses…
“You don’t know the struggle for a normal human being. #learnrealwork.”
“Good luck with the real world gf.”
“LOL humble too.”
“You were born with a silver spoon in your mouth. You may work hard, but definitely not the hardest working person in the world.”
“‘Hardest working 23 year old on earth.’ Ariana ugly, like there aren’t 23 year olds out her working 3 jobs to stay in their tiny apartments.” 
No wonder no one is buying tickets to see her perform anymore.
Of course she also posted this to Twitter and people went absolutely HAM on there as well…
If Ariana Grande is the hardest working 23-year-old on the planet, then I'm the Dali Lama.
— Dani Mogg (@DaniellaMogg) January 17, 2017 
Yes Ariana Grande is the hardest working 23 year old on earth not the ones struggling making 60¢ a day trying to provide for their families pic.twitter.com/5B08kx2Lzn 
— miss tammy (@onefishtwobitch) January 14, 2017 


Did I just see Ariana grande say she's the hardest working 23 year old on earth Lol
— hannahdown (@HannahDown1) January 15, 2017 
@ArianaGrande Hardest working 23 year old?! You litterally live in a fucking fantasy world love
— Dom O'Brien (@Dom_OBrien95) January 17, 2017 
ariana grande can't seriously think she's the hardest working 23 year old on earth, I'm laughing
— bree (@phansoIo) January 16, 2017 
"Ariana thinks she's the hardest working pers-"
Me: pic.twitter.com/R8qgTpwOUq 
— STS (@AGDangerousWmn) January 15, 2017 


Ariana Grande is saying she is the hardest working 23 year old on the planet. Bitch is clearly deluded beyond belief.
— Adam ✨ (@GodBlessShania) January 14, 2017 
Ariana Grande saying she is the hardest working 23 year old hahahaha please
— Absss (@abbieburling) January 16, 2017 
did ariana rly say she's the hardest working 23yr old woman on earth pic.twitter.com/dJAtp5mF0P 
— MC (@xgirIfriend) January 14, 2017 
I really like ariana but "hardest working"? somebody who has as much time as her to post all day on her snapchat constantly says otherwise
— abby (@petalnh) January 15, 2017 


Ariana Grande is saying she is the hardest working 23 year old on the planet. Bitch is clearly deluded beyond belief.
— Adam ✨ (@GodBlessShania) January 14, 2017 
I sure hope Ariana Grande doesn't actually thinks she's (one of the) hardest working 23 year olds in the world lol
— san (@80spetal) January 14, 2017 
I love Ariana grande, but her comment about being the hardest working 23 year old is bs lmao
— h loves Tana (@jumperzjm) January 14, 2017 
why is ariana calling herself hardest working 23 year old human on earth lmao why is she being ignorant
— h (@biebshyped) January 14, 2017 
Ariana Grande posted on Instagram that she is the hardest working, 23 year old in the world. Who agrees?
— Jaden McGrew (@JaJadenmcgrew) January 14, 2017 

Of course, 99% of the other comments praised as if she were a goddess because people are idiots.
